progress 1.2.3.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

progress (development version)

progress 1.2.3

CRAN release: 2023-12-06

  • Compiling packages linking to progress with -Wformat-security does not produce warnings now.

progress 1.2.2

CRAN release: 2019-05-16

  • Fix two bugs in the C++ API that can potentially cause irregular behavior (#94, 1).

progress 1.2.1

CRAN release: 2019-05-13

  • Add the message_class argument, to add extra classes to the messages thrown by progress.

  • Add support for RKWard, running interactive session (#76, @devillemereuil).

  • Add support for unicode characters and a right to left progress bar (#86, 1).

  • Fix a potential crash in the C++ API (#91, 1).

progress 1.2.0

CRAN release: 2018-06-14

  • Option to change the ‘current’ character in the progress bar. #47

  • New :tick_rate token, similar to :rate, but units are not assumed to be bytes. #45

  • Total number of ticks can be set to NA now, if unknown. #48

  • All progress bars (including the ones from the C++ API) can be turned off via the progress_enabled option #44

  • The stream argument is deprecated and the progress bar is always printed with message() calls.

  • Total number of iterations can be zero, to support special cases better.

  • Add finished variable, which can be queried to see if a progress bar is finished. #54 1.

  • Add a terminate() method, which can be called to explicitly remove the progress bar, #53 1.

  • Outputs greater than the bar width are automatically trimmed, 1.

  • Add a message() method to print a message line(s) above the progress bar,

  • :elapsedfull token: elapsed time in hh:mm:ss format.

  • Fix C++ compiler warnings. #43

  • Fix C++ API on Windows. #56

  • Pass self to the callback function. #55 1

progress 1.1.2

CRAN release: 2016-12-14

  • Do not run tests on CRAN, Solaris does not have microbenchmark

progress 1.1.1

CRAN release: 2016-12-13

  • Move README.md, so that it is not parsed on CRAN
  • Use https URLs instead of http, whenever possible

progress 1.1.0

  • Support for the :spin token which adds a simple ASCII spinner, @richfitz
  • Respect custom token width for calculation of the bar width, @mllg

progress 1.0.2

CRAN release: 2015-06-05

  • Fix the C++ API on Windows, and on older compilers in general.

progress 1.0.1

CRAN release: 2015-05-30

First version on CRAN.

On this page

Developed by Gábor Csárdi, Rich FitzJohn, Posit Software, PBC.
